definitions.definition: To do or say something for amusement rather than seriously.
examples: I didn’t mean what I said — I was only joking .

definitions.definition: To dupe in a friendly manner for amusement; to mess with , play with .
examples: Relax, man, I'm just joking with you.

definitions.definition: To make merry with; to make jokes upon; to rally.

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To do or say something for amusement rather than seriously.
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive , followed by with ) To dupe in a friendly manner for amusement; to mess with , play with .
( transitive , dated ) To make merry with; to make jokes upon; to rally.
